County Clare is looking solid today with 8 ft @ 14s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Crab Island and Doolin Point are the top picks, offering clean conditions during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 13 ft @ 14s WSW with fresh 23 mph winds, making it poor across the board. By the day after, we see a nice recovery with 7 ft @ 12s W swell and light 7 mph SSE winds, perfect for a fun session at spots like Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: day after.
